com.example.anna.colorgame

Class AlertDialogClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.anna.colorgame.AlertDialogClass

  • public class AlertDialogClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to easily create different alert-dialogs with custom title, message text and buttons, and to show it in specified activity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlertDialogClass(Context context, java.lang.String dataMessage)
      This constructor creates an AlertDialog with empty title and a message that will be specified by dataMessage parameter and it will be shown in specified context.
      AlertDialogClass(Context context, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String dataMessage)
      This constructor creates an AlertDialog with specified title and message that will be specified by dataMessage parameter and shown in specified context.
      AlertDialogClass(Context context, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String dataMessage)
      This constructor creates an AlertDialog with specified title and message to be shown in specified context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ButtonOK()
      Adds an OK button with onClickListener to AlertDialog, adds an onDismissListener and shows AlertDialog in an activity specified in the constructor.
      void ButtonYesNo()
      Adds two buttons "YES and NO" with onClickListener to AlertDialog, adds an onDismissListener and shows AlertDialog in an activity specified in the constructor.
      void setPlayer(Player player)
      This method sets player variable to specified value.
      void setTextToShowInAlertDialog(java.lang.String message)
      This method is used to set specified text as message of the AlertDialog.
      void setTitleMessage(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      This method is used to initiate AlertDialog with specified title and text message.
      void setTitleOfAlertDialog(java.lang.String title)
      This method is used to set specified text as title of the AlertDialog.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlertDialogClass

        public AlertDialogClass(Context context,
                        java.lang.String dataMessage)
        This constructor creates an AlertDialog with empty title and a message that will be specified by dataMessage parameter and it will be shown in specified context.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        dataMessage - String

      • AlertDialogClass

        public AlertDialogClass(Context context,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String dataMessage)
        This constructor creates an AlertDialog with specified title and message that will be specified by dataMessage parameter and shown in specified context. This method is mostly used in MainFrame, MainMenu, ChooseGame and HighScore activities.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        title - String
        dataMessage - String

      • AlertDialogClass

        public AlertDialogClass(Context context,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String dataMessage)
        This constructor creates an AlertDialog with specified title and message to be shown in specified context. dataMessage is not required
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        title - String
        message - String
        dataMessage - String

    • Method Detail

      • setTitleOfAlertDialog

        public void setTitleOfAlertDialog(java.lang.String title)
        This method is used to set specified text as title of the AlertDialog.
        Parameters:
        title - String

      • setTextToShowInAlertDialog

        public void setTextToShowInAlertDialog(java.lang.String message)
        This method is used to set specified text as message of the AlertDialog.
        Parameters:
        message - String

      • ButtonOK

        public void ButtonOK()
        Adds an OK button with onClickListener to AlertDialog, adds an onDismissListener and shows AlertDialog in an activity specified in the constructor.

      • ButtonYesNo

        public void ButtonYesNo()
        Adds two buttons "YES and NO" with onClickListener to AlertDialog, adds an onDismissListener and shows AlertDialog in an activity specified in the constructor.

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(Player player)
        This method sets player variable to specified value. Player variable is an instance of player class.
        Parameters:
        player - Player

      • setTitleMessage

        public void setTitleMessage(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String message)
        This method is used to initiate AlertDialog with specified title and text message.
        Parameters:
        title - String
        message - String
